title: Purple Axiom Runner Executor Evidence (v0.1)
description: Validates per-action runner executor evidence written to runs/<run_id>/runner/actions/<action_id>/executor.json. This artifact records the reference executor pin set and execution timing/outcome metadata. It is evidence, not identity.

executor.description: Normalized executor name (example: powershell, cmd, sh, bash).

pwsh_version.description: Exact PowerShell version string used by the runner (pinned).

invoke_atomicredteam_version.description: Exact Invoke-AtomicRedTeam module version used by the runner (pinned).

started_at_utc.description: Action start timestamp in UTC (RFC 3339 with trailing 'Z').

ended_at_utc.description: Action end timestamp in UTC (RFC 3339 with trailing 'Z').

exit_code.description: Process exit code for the primary executor invocation (0 indicates success by convention).

atomics_root_actual.description: Evidence-only: actual filesystem path used as the Atomics root/payload root. MUST NOT participate in identity-bearing hashes.

command_shell_specific.description: Evidence-only: shell-specific command string(s) actually invoked (after executor-specific rewriting/quoting).

notes.description: Optional informational notes, warnings, or non-fatal anomalies for operator debugging. Not identity-bearing.

extensions.description: Optional extension point for future fields. Producers SHOULD keep this deterministic (stable key ordering is enforced via JCS in hashed contexts, not here).
